name: Triple Tower
description:
My (solo) submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. Swing 3 blobs to the top of a massive tower of hastily-drawn pixel art!

CONTROLS - click and drag to pull the "blobs", R to reset at your last checkpoint if you get hopelessly stuck.

WARNING - hardcore mode disables all checkpoints (for a true Getting Over It experience), and thus is not recommended for your first playthrough. Try at your own sanity's risk.

MUSIC CREDITS - pretty sure everything used was cc0/public domain aside from the victory theme from https://opengameart.org/content/rainbow-rush

IMAGE CREDITS - although I drew all the images, I'd like to make a special shoutout to aseprite's spray can tool for sticking with me throughout this troubled time.
